content: this legal text summarizes a division of joint ownership agreement between two parties mr ae and mr ar regarding a building in municipality castelfidardo the building has two apartments and a garage the agreement divides the ownership into two shares with mr ae getting the ground floor apartment and mr ar getting the first floor apartment the garage and attic will be shared by both parties the agreement includes the cadastral data and boundaries of each assigned property it takes effect immediately and the expenses will be shared equally the document is signed by the parties and the notary
